H0.text: Who holds the post of Defence Secretary. Philip Hammond

H1.text: Who holds the post of Defence Secretary. Liam Fox

H2.text: Who holds the post of Defence Secretary. Gavin Williamson

H3.text: Who holds the post of Defence Secretary. Michael Fallon

A4.text: Hammond became Secretary of State for Defence on 14 October 2011 when Liam Fox resigned.

A5.text: Upon the resignation of Liam Fox over a scandal in October 2011
